import React from 'react' import { useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { clearItemFromCart, addItem, removeItem } from '../../redux/cart/cartActions' import { CheckoutItemContainer, ImageContainer, TextContainer, QuantityContainer, RemoveButtonContainer } from './CheckoutItemStyle'; const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem}) => { const {name, imageUrl, price, quantity} = cartItem const dispatch = useDispatch() return ( {name}
dispatch(removeItem(cartItem))}>❮
{quantity}
dispatch(addItem(cartItem))}>❯
 {price} dispatch(clearItemFromCart(cartItem))}>✕ ) } export default CheckoutItem
